name: BCAN BT2 450/550LBS Mini Rebounder Trampoline for Adults with Bar, Fitness Trampoline with Bungees, Adjustable Handle, Stable & Quiet, Indoor Outdoor, Whole-Body Workout & Relaxation at Home-40IN/48IN
short_description: 2026 Upgraded version - Extra Stability & Durability The BCAN trampoline rebounder is designed with 32mm thickened alloy, 10 turns of thread reinforced legs to give you the most stable experience possible during every jump. The upgraded handlebar, strengthened with M-shaped plates, and the high-quality PP jumping mat stitched with 16 strands of nylon thread, ensure lasting durability and resistance to wear.

Say Goodbye to Wobbling! After multiple testing, we've enhanced the leg design by increasing the diameter of the tubes to 32mm and upgrading the number of threads from 7 to 10. This critical improvement boosts both stability and durability. No more wobbling or instability — just a safe, steady, and reliable workout experience.

Get Started in 10 Minutes! The BCAN Rebounder Trampoline comes 11-13 pre-assembled bungees, just follow the simple manual and video tutorial to get started. If you need help, our friendly customer support team is just a message away.

Smooth, Quiet Bounce for a Peaceful Workout Enjoy a quieter, smoother workout with the BCAN rebounder. 8mm premium bungee with a strong woven outer layer and a 350-strand natural latex core, it offers a comfortable and silent bounce that won’t disturb others. The low-impact design provides maximum protection for your back and knees.

Upgraded, Super-Stable Adjustable Handlebar The BCAN rebounder trampoline features a newly reinforced adjustable handlebar for maximum stability. With M-shaped plates and locking screws, 3 reinforcement points have increased the handle's stability by 200%. It also adjusts to 3 heights (2'7" to 3'2"), making it perfect for all users.
product_description: BCAN Adult Mini Trampoline, 40" Fitness Trampoline with Bungees, U Shape Adjustable Foam Handle - Black

name: Rebounder Trampoline for Adults, 40"/50" Foldable Spring Fitness Trampoline - 450 lbs Capacity, Quiet & Stable Indoor/Outdoor Exercise Equipment for Cardio Workout
short_description: 【450 LBS Heavy-Duty Spring Rebounder - Adults & Kids Safe】Engineered with 40 high-tension springs (not bungee cords!), this professional rebounder trampoline for adults supports up to 450 lbs – 35% higher than average. The spring system absorbs impact 3x better for joint-safe cardio, whether you're doing HIIT workouts or kids are bouncing after school.

【4-Level Adjustable Handle Bar - Custom Height & Anti-Slip】Dominate every workout with our rebounder trampoline for adults with bar featuring 4 height settings (2.3'-3.2'). The ergonomic foam grip with non-slip texture keeps palms dry even during sweaty cardio sessions – perfect for tall adults rehabbing knees or short teens mastering backflips.

【Ultra-Quiet Foldable Design - Fits Any Space】Patented foldable frame folds to 1/4 size in 30 seconds – stash under beds, in car trunks, or apartment closets. Quiet rubberized springs + noise-dampening mat make it ideal for indoor late-night workouts without disturbing downstairs neighbors.
【10-Min Assembly - Jump Worry-Free】Get bouncing in 10 minutes – no tools needed! This mini trampoline works indoor/outdoor on grass, gym floors, or garage mats.

【Zero-Pinch Safety- Jump with Confidence】 Engineered with full-wrap spring guards and 2-inch padded edge, every jump eliminates pinching risks and sharp edges.450 pound capacity and 50 inch size support tandem jumps.
